item.title: Why I Left GDS
item.description: It’s been a few weeks since I left GDS after almost 3 years working on GOV.UK. I’m no stranger to saying what I feel. With the Civil Service code, we knew the rules and so did they. My full commitment was what I was thinking of, but we knew they wouldn’t get away from any else. I decided long and hard about writing this, but I just wanna tell you how I’m feeling.
